author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: أَنْتَ المُقْتَدِرُ عَلَى ما تَشَاءُ، لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ القَادِرُ العالِمُ الحَاكِمُ المُهَيْمِنُ القَيُّومُ.
translation: Powerful art Thou to do what Thou pleasest. No God is there beside Thee, the All-Powerful, the Omniscient, the Supreme Ruler, the Help in Peril, the Self-Subsisting.
